blt067ab6207fd2c28a.title: Contentstack Kickstart
blt067ab6207fd2c28a.description: This is an entry for a Contentstack Kickstart
blt067ab6207fd2c28a.rich_text: Contentstack Kickstarts are the minimum amount of code needed to connect to contentstack using the SDK, and with visual building enabled.

block.title: This is a modular block
block.copy: Contentstack Modular Blocks allow you to dynamically create, arrange, and reuse content components within a single field, offering flexibility for building complex page layouts without changes to the content type structure.

block.title: Check out the Academy
block.copy: Contentstack offers courses and explainers on how to use the platform. Check out the course on content modeling and the more development specific videos.

block.title: Join the community
block.copy: The community connects you with a vibrant network of like-minded developers to show off your work or to ask any quections.
